statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type='temperature' AND sensor_value < 30;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data;
SELECT id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) >= 5 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, location, data_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' ORDER BY location ASC, sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sd.data_id, s.sensor_name, sd.data_value, sd.timestamp FROM sensor_data sd JOIN sensors s ON sd.sensor_id = s.sensor_id WHERE sd.data_value > 50 ORDER BY s.sensor_name ASC, sd.timestamp DESC;

SELECT s.sensor_name, COUNT(sd.data_id) AS total_data_points FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data sd ON s.sensor_id = sd.sensor_id GROUP BY s.sensor_name HAVING COUNT(sd.data_id) > 100 ORDER BY total_data_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, last_reading FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY last_reading DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_type, last_reading FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE data_type = 'Temperature' AND last_reading < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_reading ASC;
SELECT * FROM measurements JOIN sensors ON measurements.sensor_id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE measurement_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room 1';
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM sensors ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(alert_message) AS num_alerts FROM sensor_alerts GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING num_alerts > 1;
SELECT * FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_id DESC, sensor_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' OR location = 'Room B';
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING max_value > 100;
SELECT sensor_data.sensor_id, sensor_data.value, sensor_metadata.description FROM sensor_data INNER JOIN sensor_metadata ON sensor_data.sensor_id = sensor_metadata.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(id) AS alerts_count FROM sensor_alerts GROUP BY sensor_id ORDER BY alerts_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name FROM sensor_location WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT sensor_id, status, last_updated FROM sensor_status WHERE status='active';
SELECT sensor_id, alert_type, alert_description FROM sensor_alert ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_name, data_type, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM sensor_location WHERE location_name LIKE 'Room%' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT MAX(value) AS max_value, MIN(value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, status, last_updated FROM sensor_status WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
